018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.model;
019
020import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
021
022import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseClassTestRule;
023import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.RestTests;
024import org.apache.hadoop.hbase.testclassification.SmallTests;
025import org.junit.ClassRule;
026import org.junit.experimental.categories.Category;
027
028@Category({ RestTests.class, SmallTests.class })
029public class TestVersionModel extends TestModelBase<VersionModel> {
030
031  @ClassRule
032  public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE =
033    HBaseClassTestRule.forClass(TestVersionModel.class);
034
035  private static final String REST_VERSION = "0.0.1";
036  private static final String OS_VERSION = "Linux 2.6.18-128.1.6.el5.centos.plusxen amd64";
037  private static final String JVM_VERSION = "Sun Microsystems Inc. 1.6.0_13-11.3-b02";
038  private static final String JETTY_VERSION = "6.1.14";
039  private static final String JERSEY_VERSION = "1.1.0-ea";
040
041  public TestVersionModel() throws Exception {
042    super(VersionModel.class);
043    AS_XML = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"yes\"?><Version JVM=\"Sun "
044      + "Microsystems Inc. 1.6.0_13-11.3-b02\" Jersey=\"1.1.0-ea\" "
045      + "OS=\"Linux 2.6.18-128.1.6.el5.centos.plusxen amd64\" REST=\"0.0.1\" Server=\"6.1.14\"/>";
046
047    AS_PB = "CgUwLjAuMRInU3VuIE1pY3Jvc3lzdGVtcyBJbmMuIDEuNi4wXzEzLTExLjMtYjAyGi1MaW51eCAy"
048      + "LjYuMTgtMTI4LjEuNi5lbDUuY2VudG9zLnBsdXN4ZW4gYW1kNjQiBjYuMS4xNCoIMS4xLjAtZWE=";
049
050    AS_JSON = "{\"JVM\":\"Sun Microsystems Inc. 1.6.0_13-11.3-b02\",\"Jersey\":\"1.1.0-ea\","
051      + "\"OS\":\"Linux 2.6.18-128.1.6.el5.centos.plusxen amd64\",\""
052      + "REST\":\"0.0.1\",\"Server\":\"6.1.14\"}";
053  }
054
055  @Override
056  protected VersionModel buildTestModel() {
057    VersionModel model = new VersionModel();
058    model.setRESTVersion(REST_VERSION);
059    model.setOSVersion(OS_VERSION);
060    model.setJVMVersion(JVM_VERSION);
061    model.setServerVersion(JETTY_VERSION);
062    model.setJerseyVersion(JERSEY_VERSION);
063    return model;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  protected void checkModel(VersionModel model) {
068    assertEquals(REST_VERSION, model.getRESTVersion());
069    assertEquals(OS_VERSION, model.getOSVersion());
070    assertEquals(JVM_VERSION, model.getJVMVersion());
071    assertEquals(JETTY_VERSION, model.getServerVersion());
072    assertEquals(JERSEY_VERSION, model.getJerseyVersion());
073  }
074}
